text: Berlei is a brand of women's underwear and in particular bras and girdles . The brand started in Australia in 1917 .Australian trademark #21931 Berlei bras are now sold worldwide by Hanesbrands. The name came from that of the firm's founder, Frederick R. Burley, who felt that his name as normally spelled was not appropriate to his products. Berlei Limited was one of the first Australian companies to expand outside Australia.Clune, page 439 Berlei (New Zealand) Limited was incorporated in 1923 and Berlei (U.K.) Limited was organised in 1930. ==References== Category:Clothing companies of Australia Category:1917 establishments Category:1910s establishments in Australia
